                                                                                                                                    Navya Naveli Nanda Feels ‘Sad’ As Near-Total Ban On Abortion Comes Into Effect In Poland; Reacts To The News                                                            


                                                                    Taking to her Instagram stories, Amitabh Bachchan’s granddaughter Navya Naveli Nanda made a post, expressing her views on the near-total ban on abortion implemented in Poland. She reacted as the ban on abortion comes into effect immediately                                                                




23252 Reads |
                                                                             
                                                                        



                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                    Published on Jan 28 2021, 18:28:57                                                                                                                                                                









                                                                                                Gretel Sequeira
                                                                                                                                                                                    

































































Amitabh Bachchan’s granddaughter Navya Naveli Nanda is an internet sensation. She has been winning the hearts of her followers, ever since she made her Instagram account public. Navya constantly treats fans with amazing pictures and also shares her thoughts and opinions. Just some time back, Navya Nanda reposted a post made by BBC News on her social media account. She made a post, expressing her views on news reported by the news agency. Navya reacted to the near-total ban on abortion in Poland and expressed her views on the same.Taking to her Instagram stories, Navya Naveli Nanda shared the post as the ban on abortion came into effect immediately. Reacting to the near-total ban on abortion, the star kid wrote, “So so sad.” Navya shared how she feels sad about the rule that was passed by the Polish government. According to the report, on Wednesday, the court passed a verdict on the grounds that “an unborn child is a human being” and hence it deserves the protection under Poland’s constitution which ensures the right to life. The report stated that abortion is now allowed in the country only in cases of rape or incest or when the pregnancy threatens the life of a mother. After the government announced that the enforcement of the near-total ban, as per the report, several protestors gathered, expressing their disapproval over the new rule.Take a look at the post below:Navya Naveli Nanda's Instagram storiesMeanwhile, Navya also shared another picture on her Instagram stories and gave her fans a glimpse of her lunch menu. She was busy eating paratha, rajma, and some yoghurt for lunch. Apart from that, it was only today that Navya dropped a post, recreating childhood memories with besties Suhana Khan, Ananya Panday, and Shanaya Kapoor. Also Read: Krishna Shroff’s Bikini Picture Grabs Ex-boyfriend Eban Hyams’ Attention; Former Lover Leaves A ‘Cool’ Comment  Image source: Instagram/ ; SpotboyE Archives
